msg: MNG-5306 : introduce ModelProblemCollectorRequest and a new ModelProblem property - version which denotes on which validation level the error/warning applies. Additionally move the logic on failing the ModelBuilding from ModelProblemCollector to ModelBuilder's protected method to allow overriding. Default maven behaviour should stay the same.
